name: Lights out (itch) (RikSnoep, Ribbon_bee, Levoefje)
description:
A quaint little horror game where you play as the monster under a kid's bed. 

Avoid the light! Throw teddy bears to distract the child, turn off lights to move around safely.

Credits

Charlie Dolders

3D modelling & texturing

Rik Snoep

Child & room concept art, texturing & 3D modelling 

Juul Cox 

AI programming, gameplay programming and post processing

Lisa Xu 

Intro and ending cutscenes, 3D modelling and concept art

Levi Vermaning

Sound design, level design, some cutscene work and all round programming
